mapper.select: select bu from project_info group by bu
select a.node_name from oranization_manager a, (select * from oranization_manager where node_name=#{bu} and parent_id is null)b where a.parent_id = b.node_id group by a.node_name
select a.name, a.no, a.BU,a.PDU, DATE_FORMAT(a.start_date,'%Y-%m') as month from project_info a where bu = #{bu} and pdu = #{pdu} order by month
select NODE_ID, NODE_NAME, LEVEL, CREATE_DATE, CREATOR, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER from oranization_manager where LEVEL = 0 group by NODE_NAME

select org.NODE_NAME as pdu, count(case when DATE_FORMAT(pro.START_DATE, '%Y%M') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%M') then 1 else null end ) as addNum, count(case when DATE_FORMAT(pro.END_DATE, '%Y%M') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%M') then 1 else null end ) as endNum, count(case when pro.TYPE = 'FP' then 1 else null end ) as fpNum, count(case when pro.TYPE = 'TM' then 1 else null end ) as tmNum from oranization_manager org LEFT JOIN project_info pro on pro.PDU = org.NODE_NAME and (DATE_FORMAT(pro.START_DATE, '%Y%M') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%M') or DATE_FORMAT(pro.END_DATE, '%Y%M') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%M')) where (select org1.NODE_NAME from oranization_manager org1 where org.PARENT_ID = org1.NODE_ID) = #{bu} group by org.NODE_NAME
mapper.sql: UNION SELECT '01' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '02' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '03' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '04' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '05' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '06' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '07' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '08' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '09' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '10' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '11' as mon,'0' as addNum UNION SELECT '12' as mon,'0' as addNum
mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTRING(mon.mon, 1,7) as mon,count(pro.NO) as totalNum, count(case when DATE_FORMAT(pro.START_DATE, '%Y%M') = DATE_FORMAT(mon.mon, '%Y%M') then 1 else null end) as addNum, count(case when DATE_FORMAT(pro.END_DATE, '%Y%M') = DATE_FORMAT(mon.mon, '%Y%M') then 1 else null end) as endNum from ( select date_add(NOW(), interval -3 month) as mon union select date_add(NOW(), interval -2 month) as mon union select date_add(NOW(), interval -1 month) as mon union select date_add(NOW(), interval 0 month) as mon union select date_add(NOW(), interval 1 month) as mon union select date_add(NOW(), interval 2 month) as mon ) as mon left join project_info pro on pro.BU = #{bu} and SUBSTRING(pro.START_DATE, 1,7) <= SUBSTRING(mon.mon, 1,7) and SUBSTRING(pro.END_DATE, 1,7) >= SUBSTRING(mon.mon, 1,7) group by SUBSTRING(mon.mon, 1,7) ORDER BY SUBSTRING(mon.mon, 1,7)

SELECT ORM.NODE_NAME AS pdu, AVG(CASE WHEN VAL.PARAMETER_ID =83 THEN IFNULL(VAL.VALUE,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS ydscl, AVG(CASE WHEN VAL.PARAMETER_ID =84 THEN IFNULL(VAL.VALUE,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS e2escl, AVG(CASE WHEN VAL.PARAMETER_ID =85 THEN IFNULL(VAL.VALUE,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS ddscl FROM ORANIZATION_MANAGER ORM LEFT JOIN PROJECT_INFO PRO ON PRO.PDU = ORM.NODE_NAME LEFT JOIN PROJECT_PARAMETER_VALUE_NEW VAL ON VAL.NO = PRO.NO AND VAL.PARAMETER_ID IN (83,84,85) AND DATE_FORMAT(VAL.MONTH,'%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') WHERE ORM.LEVEL = 1 AND EXISTS( SELECT TMP.NODE_ID FROM ORANIZATION_MANAGER TMP WHERE TMP.NODE_ID=ORM.PARENT_ID AND TMP.NODE_NAME = #{buName} AND TMP.LEVEL = 0 ) GROUP BY ORM.NODE_NAME

SELECT PRO.NO,PRO.NAME,IFNULL(VAL.VALUE,0) AS VALUE FROM PROJECT_INFO PRO LEFT JOIN PROJECT_PARAMETER_VALUE_NEW VAL ON VAL.NO = PRO.NO AND DATE_FORMAT(VAL.MONTH,'%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') AND EXISTS( SELECT * FROM PARAMETER_INFO INFO WHERE INFO.NAME = #{col} AND INFO.ID = VAL.PARAMETER_ID ) WHERE PRO.BU = #{buName} AND SUBSTRING(PRO.START_DATE, 1,7) <= SUBSTRING(NOW(), 1,7) AND SUBSTRING(PRO.END_DATE, 1,7) >= SUBSTRING(NOW(), 1,7) ORDER BY IFNULL(VAL.VALUE,0) DESC limit 5

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(VAL.MONTH,'%Y-%m') AS MONTH, MAX(CASE WHEN VAL.PARAMETER_ID =83 THEN IFNULL(VAL.VALUE,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS ydscl, MAX(CASE WHEN VAL.PARAMETER_ID =84 THEN IFNULL(VAL.VALUE,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS e2escl, MAX(CASE WHEN VAL.PARAMETER_ID =85 THEN IFNULL(VAL.VALUE,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS ddscl, MAX(CASE WHEN VAL.PARAMETER_ID =137 THEN IFNULL(VAL.VALUE,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS wtdwclxl, MAX(CASE WHEN VAL.PARAMETER_ID =105 THEN IFNULL(VAL.VALUE,0) ELSE 0 END ) AS dmreviewqxm FROM PROJECT_INFO PRO LEFT JOIN PROJECT_PARAMETER_VALUE_NEW VAL ON VAL.NO = PRO.NO AND VAL.PARAMETER_ID IN (83,84,85,137,105) WHERE PRO.NO = #{no} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(VAL.MONTH,'%Y-%m')

SELECT INFO.NAME,PRO.UNIT,DATE_FORMAT(VAL.MONTH,'%Y-%m') AS MONTH,MAX(VAL.VALUE) AS VALUE FROM CODE_MASTER_INFO CODE INNER JOIN PARAMETER_INFO INFO ON INFO.SMALL_TYPE_VALUE = CODE.VALUE INNER JOIN PROJECT_PARAMETER PRO ON PRO.PARAMETER_ID = INFO.ID LEFT JOIN PROJECT_PARAMETER_VALUE_NEW VAL ON VAL.NO = PRO.NO AND VAL.PARAMETER_ID = PRO.PARAMETER_ID WHERE CODE.CODEKEY = 'SmallType' AND CODE.NAME = #{smallType} AND SUBSTR(CODE.VALUE,1,1) = (SELECT CODE2.VALUE FROM CODE_MASTER_INFO CODE2 WHERE CODE2.CODEKEY = 'BigType' AND CODE2.NAME = #{bigType} ) AND PRO.NO = #{projNo} AND PRO.IS_DISPLAY = 1 GROUP BY INFO.NAME,PRO.UNIT,DATE_FORMAT(VAL.MONTH,'%Y-%m')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(VAL.MONTH,'%Y-%m') AS MONTH, INFO.NAME AS NAME,PAR.UNIT AS UNIT, MAX(VAL.VALUE) AS VALUE FROM PROJECT_INFO PRO LEFT JOIN PROJECT_PARAMETER_VALUE_NEW VAL ON VAL.NO = PRO.NO AND VAL.PARAMETER_ID in (82,83,84,85,86,88,89,95,97,110) LEFT JOIN PROJECT_PARAMETER PAR ON PAR.NO = PRO.NO AND PAR.PARAMETER_ID = VAL.PARAMETER_ID LEFT JOIN PARAMETER_INFO INFO ON INFO.ID = VAL.PARAMETER_ID WHERE PRO.NO = #{no} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(VAL.MONTH,'%Y-%m'),INFO.NAME,PAR.UNIT
SELECT INFO.NAME AS NAME,INFO.UNIT AS UNIT FROM PARAMETER_INFO INFO WHERE INFO.ID in (82,83,84,85,86,88,89,95,97,110)
